message: Utility classes should not have a public or default constructor.
'method def modifier' has incorrect indentation level 13, expected level should be one of the following: 14, 16, 18.
'method def' child has incorrect indentation level 15, expected level should be one of the following: 16, 18, 20.
'method def rcurly' has incorrect indentation level 13, expected level should be one of the following: 14, 16, 18.
